SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Geriatric Depression Scale Short Form - Are you basically satisfied with your life?
Geriatric Depression Scale Short Form - Have you dropped many of your activities and interests?
Geriatric Depression Scale Short Form - Do you feel that your life is empty?
Geriatric Depression Scale Short Form - Do you often get bored?
Geriatric Depression Scale Short Form - Are you in good spirits most of the time?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: GDS-SF - Good Spirits Most of Time

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Geriatric Depression Scale Short Form - Are you afraid that something bad is going to happen to you?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: GDS-SF - Afraid of Something Bad Happening

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Geriatric Depression Scale Short Form - Do you feel happy most of the time?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: GDS-SF - Feel Happy Most of Time

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Geriatric Depression Scale Short Form - Do you often feel helpless?
Geriatric Depression Scale Short Form - Do you prefer to stay at home rather than going out and doing new things?
Geriatric Depression Scale Short Form - Do you feel you have more problems with memory than most?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: GDS-SF - More Memory Problems Than Most

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Geriatric Depression Scale Short Form - Do you think it is wonderful to be alive now?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: GDS-SF - Think Wonderful to Be Alive

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Geriatric Depression Scale Short Form - Do you feel pretty worthless the way you are now?
Geriatric Depression Scale Short Form - Do you feel full of energy?
Geriatric Depression Scale Short Form - Do you feel that your situation is hopeless?

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: GDS02-Most People Better Off Than You
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Geriatric Depression Scale Short Form - Do you think that most people are better off than you are?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: GDS-SF - Think Most People Better Off Than You

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Geriatric Depression Scale Short Form - Total score.
